text: The Chief Executive Officer of AW Energy, Finland John Liljelund said that they are willing to share their experience and technology to generate power using sea waves and also support Sri Lanka in this regard.He said that the basic surveys around the coastal belt of Sri Lanka has been completed and expects to start the generating of power using sea waves next year.He made these comments yesterday (9th Oct.) during Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghes visit to AW Energy to study the generating of power using sea waves. The delegation also got an understanding and operation of the high tech machinery used in manufacturing energy using sea waves.According to a research conducted, the Indian Ocean is known as a zone generating power using sea waves.
title: Plans to generate power using sea waves
